citations.narrative:
During an inspection attempt, the facility was found to be empty and the building for lease. All phone numbers for the
Utah facility are no longer in service. Phone numbers to the Minnesota headquarters result in "unable to be completed"
messages. No new social media posts have been uploaded since 4/2022.
Registrants are required to notify Animal Care Deputy Administrator within 10 days of any changes in operations.
Correct by May 15, 2023.
No exit interview completed.
n

narrative:
2.27(a) 
   
Notification of change of operation. 
During an inspection attempt, the facility was found to be empty and the building for lease.  All phone numbers for the 
Utah facility are no longer in service.  Phone numbers to the Minnesota headquarters result in "unable to be completed" 
messages. No new social media posts have been uploaded since 4/2022.   
Registrants are required to notify Animal Care Deputy Administrator within 10 days of any changes in operations. 
Correct by May 15, 2023. 
 
No  exit interview completed. 
 
 n
